mscstts 0.5.6

  • Changelog

Locales for Microsoft Translate

Source: R/ms_locales.R
ms_locales.Rd

Locales for Microsoft Translate

ms_locales()

ms_locale_df()

ms_languages()

ms_language_codes()

Value

A list of Locales and the Speech Voices

Note

This is generated from the JSON output of ms_list_voices

Examples

ms_locales()
#> $`ar-EG`
#> $`ar-EG`$Female
#> [1] "Microsoft Server Speech Text to Speech Voice (ar-EG, Hoda)"
#> 
#> 
#> $`ar-SA`
#> $`ar-SA`$Male
#> [1] "Microsoft Server Speech Text to Speech Voice (ar-SA, Naayf)"
#> 
#>
